data.title: with Kento Kaku and Natsuna Watanabe playing between male part and female part of Ranma respectively.
data.meta_description: Posts about with Kento Kaku and Natsuna Watanabe playing between male part and female part of Ranma respectively. written by japanworldnetwork
data.text: Ranma 1/2らんま 1/2 – Ranma Saotome and Genam, his father fall into the cursed springs at Jusenkyo. The curse will revert when exposed to hot water until their next cold water exposure with physical body. Genma falls into the spring of a drowned panda while Ranma falls into the spring of a drowned girl. After returned to Japan, Genma and Soun( Musabetsu Kakutō Ryū 無差別格闘流) Dojo fellows agreed before that their children would marry together. Soun has three daughters: Kasumi, Nabiki and Akane. Since Akane has a range of Ranma’s age, she is appointed out for bridal duty with Ranma. With some reason, Akane doesn’t like men at all and Ranma has change to girl form with her together for living. Since they have not consulted on decision of the engagement, they are pretended as lovers by helping each other in most of the events……………..anyway, the live action TV adaption of “Ranma ½” broadcasted on TV in Japan. The movie contains several manga scenes mixed from original story into this big movie. The movie stars Yui Aragaki as Akane, with Kento Kaku and Natsuna Watanabe playing between male part and female part of Ranma respectively.
